Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Aa Cecropin A, Aa Cecropin A2

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synergistic Efficacy of Aedes aegypti Antimicrobial Peptide Cecropin A2 and Tetracycline against Pseudomonas aeruginosa
Literature.Author: Zheng Z, Tharmalingam N, Liu Q, Jayamani E, Kim W, Fuchs BB, Zhang R, Vilcinskas A, Mylonakis E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA 1016(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 77326(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MW2(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium E007(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes EAE 2625(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli OP50(MIC=4µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA103(MIC=64µg/ml)
